description:
The Organic Tea Project's yummy honey sticky chai is a traditional blend of Indian spices with malty whole leaf Assam tea that is then infused with organic forest honey to make it sticky.

As well as tasting delicious, Sticky Chai (sometimes known as wet chai) is known to help boost heart health, reduce blood sugar levels, aid digestion and help with weight loss. 


FLAVOUR

Sweet, spicy, malty

 

STRENGTH

Medium - Strong 

STICKY CHAI TEA INGREDIENTS

Organic Whole Leaf Premium Assam Tea, Organic Honey, Cardamom, Cinnamon, Ginger, Cloves, Star Anise & Black Peppercorns

 

HOW TO BREW YOUR STICKY CHAI

  • Add 2 heaping teaspoons to a milk jug
  • Add double shot (160ml) of hot water and brew for 4 minutes
  • Add 120ml of milk and steam
  • Strain into a glass or cup
name: The Organic Tea Project 3EACH
